name: Dimilix Spiderweb
description:
Dimilix Spiderweb is a collaborative project with a choose-your-own-adventure structure. Players will be able to guide Felix and Dimitri through the mysteries of Claude's old estate and the labyrinth of their feelings for each other. 

Please consider leaving a comment on AO3 or anonymously through CuriousCat, and/or retweet if you enjoyed! Thank you for your support ♡

Since the project delves into horror and contains NSFW content, chapter 2 of our AO3 listing includes a full list of tags and content warnings.

Note: Because of the soundtrack and the game’s complexity, experiencing the project in full is done best with a download. You’ll receive 2 exclusive emotes with the game file (not included with APK)!
